item.title: Projects
item.description: .projectSection{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex-wrap:wrap}.projects{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.sourceBtn{background-color:#0077b5;padding:1em;max-height:1em;margin-left:1em;align-self:center}.project{background-color:#eee;margin:1em;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between;border-bottom:inherit;padding:0;min-width:20%}.project p{max-width:20em;min-width:20em;flex-basis:auto;flex-grow:1}.projectTitle{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;background-color:#d8d8d8;padding:.5em 1em}.projectTitle a,.projectTitle a:visited,.projectTitle a:active{color:#fff}.projectDetails{padding:1em}@media screen and (max-width:569px){.projectCategory{align-items:center;align-content:center;justify-content:center;justify-items:center}.project{min-width:91%}.project p{min-width:inherit}.projectTitle i{color:#fff}.projectCategory h3{min-width:15%;margin-right:1em}}@media(min-width:570px) and (max-width:820px){.project{min-width:91%}.project p{min-width:inherit}} DATA ANALYSIS Instagram Downloader Description: Instagram data mining program for archiving and data analysis Skills learned/used: Java, Design patterns, Unit testing, Maven War over time Description: Renders and animates territorial changes in Syria and Iraq during the Syrian civil war Skills learned/used: Perl, Selenium, Imagemagick
